description.value:
This painting conceals a secure extradimensional space.

Wondrous Item: Uncommon

Property:

The painting conceals an extradimensional space that can hold up to 5 cubic feet of material up to 100 pounds. Whatever it contains, the painting weighs only 1 pound. Drawing an item from the space is a minor action.

Power - At-Will (Minor Action)

Requirement: To activate this power, a creature must look exactly like the creature depicted in the painting.

Effect: The portrait vanishes in its frame, leaving behind a 1-foot-square hole that provides access to the item's extradimensional space.
